securityRecommendations: Store TREASURY_MASTER_KEY in a secure environment (not in version control)
Consider using a Hardware Security Module (HSM) for production
Implement multi-signature controls for critical accounts
Monitor credential access logs for unusual activity
Backup the secure vault to multiple secure locations
nextSteps: Update your application to use CredentialManager instead of reading files directly
Test credential retrieval with the new system
Set up monitoring for vault access
Configure multi-signature for jackpot reserve if needed
Delete original key files after confirming migration success
